synopsis.text:
You're invited on a mysterious journey with 30 eclectic souls, all aboard a questionable bus bound for the enigmatic Nanakimura village. Nestled deep within the mountains, this elusive utopia promises a life free from worldly troubles, offering a fresh start to those desperate to escape their mundane existence. Each passenger carries their own secrets and scars, united by a shared desire for a new beginning.

Upon arrival, they find an eerie ghost town, seemingly untouched for a year, save for the faint lingering scent of life. The abandoned village isn't the sanctuary they'd hoped for, and the surrounding forest holds sinister secrets. As group members inexplicably vanish and chilling claw marks are discovered, fear and suspicion begin to unravel the group's fragile unity.

Can they uncover the truth behind the deserted Nanakimura village and its terrifying secrets, or will they fall victim to the very legend they sought refuge in? Only time will tell if any of them can escape the clutches of this lost village. Don't dare miss a single episode of this thrilling, suspense-filled adventure!
